name: Tower Defense: Ragnarok
description:
Tower Defense Ragnarok instructions:

Destroy those powerful Spaceships before they can reach to your core! Deploy all your weapons to crush them!! The sooner the better!!!

Controls :
Pan around scene - Mouse Right Click and Move

Select Objects - Mouse Left Click

Zoom In/Out - Mouse Scroll wheel Up/Down

Pause/Play - Escape Key

Speed up Game - Space bar

Switch between Camera - 1/2/3 Key
